product_name: Trail Tested: A Thru-Hiker's Insights Into Hiking and Backpacking - 2nd Edition
long_description: Packed with comprehensive details, the updated. Author: Justin Lichter. Softcover; 252 pages; color photographs and illustrations. Morris Book Publishing, LLC.; copyright 2013. Includes gear advice, gear lists for all seasons, thru-hiking tricks, tips on hiking with your dog, hiking abroad and advanced techniques.
short_description: Packed with comprehensive details, the updated Trail Tested: A Thru-Hiker's Insights Into Hiking and Backpacking draws on the experienced knowledge of author Justin Lichter.
